info.name: Brick-Hill Classic Christmas Theme!
info.description:
The classic and colorful Brick-Hill Christmas theme in 2021!
Made by rowbot on Brick-Hill (ID: 484)
info.additionalInfo:
11.11.2021
CHRISTMAS IS (almost) HERE (Again!!!!!!)

Changelog:

-Fixed buttons not using the correct theme colors
-Updated the pages using the new site design theme (Although they aren't 100% stable)
-Updated other minor stuff to fit more with the christmas theme

- Minor bug fixes
